name: Dream Maze (will rename)
description:
Do you like riddles, challenges and Easter eggs? Well I can give you 2 out of 3 but this game is still cool! Try the prototype now (or donate 1$) and tell me your ideas!

This game is still in Developement.

Do not request the Clickteam Fusion files, as I will not provide them.

This game was made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5.
